Entries.{{ModId}}_M2: Hi @, I think I'll be able to build my own balloon based on some books I found and some tips Marcello gave me. It'll be a lot cheaper than buying one, at least! I can get most of the materials, but I need a lot of cloth. Can you help me? I promise to pay you back!  ^   -Penny%action AddQuest {{ModId}}_Q1%%[#]Hot Air Balloon Materials
Entries.{{ModId}}_M5: Hi @! I thought I'd update you on how my balloon pilot license is going. I got medically approved to fly by Harvey; he had a lot of questions about flying and balloons in general. He doesn't seem very interested in going up himself though. I'm currently studying for my written test. Marcello's approved my balloon design, so once I pass the test I'm going to start building it while I practice flying with him. Emily's been giving me tips about sewing and handling all the cloth I got from you.  ^   -Penny[#]Pilot Medical Certification
Entries.{{ModId}}_M6: Hi @! I passed my written test, and my balloon is almost done! I'm having my (hopefully) final check ride with Marcello soon. After that, I'll be able to start flying on my own, and even taking passengers! Maybe after that we can go for a ride.  ^   -Penny[#]Check Ride
Entries.{{ModId}}_M7: I passed my check ride! 'With flying colors' is how Marcello put it. We also tested out my new balloon. It handles wonderfully! Stop by later, and I'll take you up!  ^   -Penny[#]Ready To Fly
